description: This is a FastAPI route module defining an endpoint for retrieving logs related to a specific run by its ID. It handles authentication, database retrieval, and generates a presigned URL for accessing logs stored externally.

classes.name: RunHistory
classes.description: Database model representing the history of an execution run, including a log file path.

methods.name: get_log_url( run_id: int, db: Session = Depends(get_db), _: Any = Depends(require_roles("admin", "tester", "viewer")), )
methods.description: API endpoint to fetch a presigned URL for the logs associated with a specific run ID, with role-based access control.

ctags.name: get_log_url
ctags.signature: ( run_id: int, db: Session = Depends(get_db), _: Any = Depends(require_roles("admin", "tester", "viewer")), )
